analysis.key_quote: Federal workers deserve respect, and this proposed change in status is very disrespectful and will put many senior civil servants at the mercy of political shifts, and this will reduce their efficacy in doing their vital public service duties.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting the disrespect towards federal workers and the potential negative impact on their ability to perform their duties, indicating concerns about politicization and the erosion of civil service protections.
